𓊌 ⇔ 𓊨 𓊍 stair дур dur “stone”

𓊽 𓏏 duration

𒁺𒊒 du-ru dura eternity, permanence
𒁺𒊑 du-ri eternal 𒁕𒊑 da-ri eternal 𒁕𒊒 da-ru dura eternal, lasting
𒁕 𒌷 da-ri₂ Daur 𒁕𒊏𒀀𒋾 da-ra-a-ti darāti duraty eternal duration

𒁍 GID₂ great : to be long #ᵈarkum #ᵈarākum (“long”) 𒁍𒁕 SIR.DA #ᵈaraku 𒀀𒋆𒌅 a-rik-tu arc length

𓎛 𓇳 𓎛 | eternity | dura > hurrah > #ḫrḫ ⇔ hora hour

𓎛 𓁷 𓂋 𓈐 | distant | दूर dūr дур dur دور dūr

derived :

Dauer दूर dūrá, “distant, far, long” δηρός dērós, “long” *dweh₂- “far, long”
duration dūrātiō enduring dūrō dūrus (“hard”) stur dörr *deru-, *drew- (“hard, fast” Lithuanian drū́tas “firm, strong” trum “trim, strong, firm” Sanskrit ध्रुव dhruva, “firm, fixed”
der < ter : aeternus “eternal” aeviternus *h₂eyu- ewig-turning

𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 | eternity, for ever |

𓈎 𓋴 𓌟 тврд tvrd dura™ = hard
𓊽 𓊽 𒁕 𒀀 𒊑 da-a-ri dura ⇔ steady 𓆖
𓎝 𓎛 𓏜 𒁕𒊑𒀀𒄠 da-ri-a-am dauernd ⇔ 𒅈𒅗 archae

𓃡 dogo @ Hausa ⇔ 𓎝 𓎛 𓏜 dura (long)

𓉔𓂋𓅱𓇳𓏤 ⇔ duration𓄲 dawn 𓇼𓄿𓅱𓇳
𓉐 dura door: dwell
